summary: Mordheim - City of the Damned aims to recreate digitally the setting of Games Workshop\'s Warhammer: Fantasy Battles skirmish game Mordheim. Environment, Enemies, Spells, Weapons, Loot, the whole lot.
descriptionHtml:
Mordheim - City of the Damned aims to recreate digitally the setting of Games Workshop\'s Warhammer: Fantasy Battles skirmish game Mordheim. Environment, Enemies, Spells, Weapons, Loot, the whole lot. 

The current version is simply a small ruinous urban area constructed with existing Skyrim assetts, eventually i want to make basically a whole new, self contained experience. 

The area is currently empty (no enemies etc) to see if people have any interest in seeing an expanded city area represented. 

To access the worldspace you need to use the command console (the ~ key). Simply enter the command: 

cow mordheim 0,0 

This will teleport you to the center of the bridge at the middle of the area. 

Run around, have a bit of a play and please comment or leave some feedback if you\'d like to see more where this came from. 

Thanks for looking! 

******************************************* 

This mod is in no way endorsed or supported by Games Workshop, all trademarks remain the property of GW.
author: plainoldandrew - banzaitravis on nexus
